Package com.csse3200.game.entities.factories

Class DefenceFactory

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.factories.DefenceFactory
public class DefenceFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating defence entities (e.g., sling shooters). This class should not be instantiated â€” all methods and configuration are static utilities.
